metadata.title: CVE-2017-11730 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read was found in the function OpCode (called fromdecompileINCR_DECR line 1474) in util/decompile.c in Ming 0.4.8, whichallows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
